Text.Value: Two things, Adler - and I'm going to make this simple enough so even a total imbecile like yourself can understand.
One, I don't give a damn about your excuses. You owe us the agreed amount, on time, every month.
And two, you call me "sweetie" ever again, and I'll shove my knife so far up your ass that people will mistake you for a unicorn.

Responses.ScriptNotes: cold, hard threat - right in the face
